Title: Provides an exemption from workers' compensation coverage for certain members of a recognized religious sect
Summary: Permits an employer who is a member of a recognized religious sect to file an application with the department of labor to be exempted from the provisions of the workers' compensation law with respect to employees who are members of the same recognized religious sect whose religious tenets or teachings oppose acceptance of any insurance benefits.
LawCode: Add ยง126, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing an exemption from coverage for certain members of a recognized religious sect
